channel.title: Loading character files from FTP

item.title: Loading character files from FTP
item.dc:creator: @Andrew1112 Andrew1112
item.description:
@Andrew1112 wrote:

Hi i am Head admin of Natural-scape and i wanted to find out how to load character files from an FTP server.

[code]public int loadgame(String playerName, String playerPass) {
for (Integer bUid : server.bannedUid) {
if (uid == bUid.intValue()) {
return 4;
}
}

	long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
	String line = "";
	String token = "";
	String token2 = "";
	String[] token3 = new String[3];
	boolean EndOfFile = false;
	int ReadMode = 0;
	BufferedReader characterfile = null;
	boolean charFileFound = false;
	int[] playerLooks = new int[19];
	try {
		characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader( "./characters/"
				+ playerName + ".txt"));
		charFileFound = true;
	} catch (FileNotFoundException fileex1) {
	}

	if (charFileFound == false) {
		misc.println(playerName + ": character file not found.");
		
		return 13;
	}[/code]

That is my load code. Can any1 tell me how to make it read from the FTP server?

the ftp link is ftp://natural-scape.com:NOT_TELLING_YOU@ftp.natural-scape.com

If anyone can help me i would appreciate it very much.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2008, 04:33:54 PM[/size][hr]No body knows how to do this?!

Read full topic
